verses.name: John 9:34
verses.text: They answered and said unto him, Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.

verses.name: John 9:35
verses.text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?

verses.name: John 9:36
verses.text: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?

verses.name: John 9:37
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Thou hast both seen him, and it is he that talketh with thee.

verses.name: John 9:38
verses.text: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.
